pr_title: Add profile agent reporting to MasterBench

timeline.bodyText: Does this mean the actual throughput will not be in the json output itself? I think the throughput value should be in the json.
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Do we really need this? It's so easily derivable.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: for these getters and setters which are part of mStatistics, do we need them anymore?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: Should there be getters and setters for these, for json ser/de?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: These are currently all public for json ser/de.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: I think this parsing should be pulled out into a library, since I think it will be reused in the future.
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: I agree that it will. But I am not sure how it will be used in the future so leaving it in here for now. Refactoring this out will be easy and will go to a more appropriate place then.
replies.author: bradyoo
